      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      java.lang.String ControlInterface.addPhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String albumName)
      Calls global User user method to get Album with name albumName Calls Album method to add Photo with filename filename

      void ControlInterface.addPhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String caption, java.lang.String albumName)
      Calls global User user method to get Album with name albumName Calls Album method to add Photo with filename filename and caption caption This is the method to use when a photo is being added to the user's system for the first time
      void Control.createAlbum(java.lang.String name) 
      void ControlInterface.createAlbum(java.lang.String name)
      Does typechecking for input arguments Calls method in global User user that adds new album with name name
      void Control.deleteAlbum(java.lang.String name) 
      void ControlInterface.deleteAlbum(java.lang.String name)
      Does typechecking for input arguments Calls method in global User user that deletes album with name name
      java.util.List<Photo> Control.listPhotos(java.lang.String albumName) 
      java.util.List<Photo> ControlInterface.listPhotos(java.lang.String albumName)
      Lists photos in Album albumName of User
      void Control.movePhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String oldAlbum, java.lang.String newAlbum) 
      void ControlInterface.movePhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String oldAlbum, java.lang.String newAlbum)
      Calls global User user method to get Album with name oldAlbum, Calls Album method to delete Photo with filename filename from oldAlbum, Calls global User user method to get Album with name newAlbum, Calls Album method to add Photo with filename filename to newAlbum
      void Control.removePhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String albumname) 
      void ControlInterface.removePhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String albumName)
      Calls global User user method to get Album with name albumName Calls Album method to delete Photo with filename filename from Album with albumName
